front.title: Reactions to Signaling from ECN Support for RTP/RTCP

abstract.t: This document presents various responses to Congestion Experience (CE) notifications by real time applications that have negotiated end-to-end support of Explicit Congestion Notification (ECN). This document is a follow-on effort of [rfc6679], which specifies the signaling used to provide ECN support for RTP/RTCP flows.
